title: Goldman CEO Blankfein likely to step down by December - NYT
text:
May 18, 2018 / 6:32 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago Goldman CEO Blankfein likely to step down by December - NYT Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
(Reuters) - Goldman Sachs Group Inc ( GS.N ) Chief Executive Lloyd Blankfein is expected to step down by December, the New York Times reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the bankâ€™s plan. FILE PHOTO: Lloyd Blankfein, CEO of Goldman Sachs, speaks at the Boston College Chief Executives Club luncheon in Boston, MA, U.S., March 22, 2018. REUTERS/Brian Snyder/File Photo
Blankfein, 63, is likely to be replaced by Goldman President David Solomon, the publication reported nyti.ms/2x2xtnt.
Goldman was not immediately available for comment. Reporting by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru; Editing by Maju Samuel
